Kassiopeia  3
Monte Carlo simulation program specializing in tracking particles in electric and magnetic fields

46 static struct sGraphs_s {
47  TGraph *ZPosition;
48  TGraph *Radius;
49  TGraph *Steps;
50 
51  TGraph *ElectricPotential;
52  TGraph *ElectricField;
53  TGraph *MagneticField;

55  TGraph *Time;

72 const int graphcolors[14] = { kBlack, kRed+2, kGreen+2, kBlue+2, kMagenta+2, kYellow+2, kCyan+2, kPink-1, kSpring-1, kAzure-1, kOrange-1, kTeal-1, kViolet-1, kGray };
73 
74 #define READ_VALUE( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT, xTYPE, xGETTER ) \
75  ( xREADER.Exists< xTYPE >( xNAME ) \
76  ? xREADER.Get< xTYPE >( xNAME ).xGETTER \
77  : (xDEFAULT) )
78 #define READ_STRING( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT ) \
79  READ_VALUE( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT, KSString, Value() )
80 #define READ_INT( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT ) \
81  READ_VALUE( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT, KSInt, Value() )
82 #define READ_UINT( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT ) \
83  READ_VALUE( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT, KSUInt, Value() )
84 #define READ_DOUBLE( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT ) \
85  READ_VALUE( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT, KSDouble, Value() )
86 #define READ_VECTOR_Z( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT ) \
87  READ_VALUE( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT, KSThreeVector, Value().Z() )
88 #define READ_VECTOR_R( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT ) \
89  READ_VALUE( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT, KSThreeVector, Value().Perp() )
90 #define READ_VECTOR_MAG( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT ) \
91  READ_VALUE( xREADER, xNAME, xDEFAULT, KSThreeVector, Value().Magnitude() )
92 #define READ_VECTOR_DOTP( xREADER, xNAMEA, xNAMEB, xDEFAULT ) \
93  ( xREADER.Exists< KSThreeVector >( xNAMEA ) && xREADER.Exists< KSThreeVector >( xNAMEB ) \
94  ? xREADER.Get< KSThreeVector >( xNAMEA ).Value().Dot( xREADER.Get< KSThreeVector >( xNAMEB ).Value() ) \
95  : (xDEFAULT) )
96 
97 #define PREP_MULTIGRAPH( xNAME, xTITLE ) \
98  sMultigraphs.xNAME = new TMultiGraph( #xNAME, xTITLE ); \
99  tOutputArray->Add( sMultigraphs.xNAME );
100 
101 #define DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( xNAME, xOPTION, xXLABEL, xYLABEL ) \
102  sMultigraphs.xNAME->Draw( xOPTION ); \
103  sMultigraphs.xNAME->GetXaxis()->SetTitle( xXLABEL ); \
104  sMultigraphs.xNAME->GetXaxis()->SetTitleOffset( 1.2 ); \
105  sMultigraphs.xNAME->GetXaxis()->SetTitleSize( 0.03 ); \
106  sMultigraphs.xNAME->GetXaxis()->SetLabelSize( 0.03 ); \
107  sMultigraphs.xNAME->GetYaxis()->SetTitle( xYLABEL ); \
108  sMultigraphs.xNAME->GetYaxis()->SetTitleOffset( 1.8 ); \
109  sMultigraphs.xNAME->GetYaxis()->SetTitleSize( 0.03 ); \
110  sMultigraphs.xNAME->GetYaxis()->SetLabelSize( 0.03 );
111 
112 #define PREP_GRAPH( xNAME, xCOLOR ) \
113  sGraphs.xNAME = new TGraph(); \
114  sGraphs.xNAME->SetLineColor( xCOLOR ); \
115  sMultigraphs.xNAME->Add( sGraphs.xNAME );
116 
117 #define UPDATE_GRAPH( xNAME, xXVALUE, xYVALUE ) \
118  sGraphs.xNAME->SetPoint( sGraphs.xNAME->GetN(), (xXVALUE), (xYVALUE) );
119 
120 #define PRINT_GRAPH( xNAME ) \
121  std::cout << " " << #xNAME << ":" \
122  << "\tmin=" << TMath::MinElement( sGraphs.xNAME->GetN(), sGraphs.xNAME->GetY() ) \
123  << "\tmax=" << TMath::MaxElement( sGraphs.xNAME->GetN(), sGraphs.xNAME->GetY() ) \
124  << "\tmean=" << sGraphs.xNAME->GetMean() \
125  << "\trms=" << sGraphs.xNAME->GetRMS( 2 ) \
126  << "\tarea=" << sGraphs.xNAME->Integral() \
127  << std::endl;
128 
129 
130 int AnalyzeFile( KRootFile *aRootFile, po::variables_map aOptions )
131 {
132  static unsigned int tIndex = 0;
133 
134  int tColor = graphcolors[tIndex];
135 
136  KSReadFileROOT tReader;
137  tReader.OpenFile( aRootFile );
138 
139  KSReadRunROOT& tRunReader = tReader.GetRun();
140  KSReadEventROOT& tEventReader = tReader.GetEvent();
141  KSReadTrackROOT& tTrackReader = tReader.GetTrack();
142  KSReadStepROOT& tStepReader = tReader.GetStep();
143 
144  KSReadObjectROOT& tTrackWorld = tTrackReader.GetObject( "output_track_world" );
145  //KSReadObjectROOT& tStepWorld = tStepReader.Get( "output_step_world" );
146 
147  for( tRunReader = 0; tRunReader <= tRunReader.GetLastRunIndex(); tRunReader++ )
148  {
149  unsigned int tRunID = tRunReader.GetRunIndex();
150  if ( aOptions.count("run") )
151  {
152  vector<unsigned int> tRuns = aOptions["run"].as< vector<unsigned int> >();
153  if ( std::find( tRuns.begin(), tRuns.end(), tRunID ) == tRuns.end() )
154  continue;
155  }
156 
157  for( tEventReader = tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex(); tEventReader <= tRunReader.GetLastEventIndex(); tEventReader++ )
158  {
159  unsigned int tEventID = tEventReader.GetEventIndex() - tRunReader.GetFirstEventIndex();
160  if ( aOptions.count("event") )
161  {
162  vector<unsigned int> tEvents = aOptions["event"].as< vector<unsigned int> >();
163  if ( std::find( tEvents.begin(), tEvents.end(), tEventID ) == tEvents.end() )
164  continue;
165  }
166 
167  for( tTrackReader = tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex(); tTrackReader <= tEventReader.GetLastTrackIndex(); tTrackReader++ )
168  {
169  unsigned int tTrackID = tTrackReader.GetTrackIndex() - tEventReader.GetFirstTrackIndex();
170  if ( aOptions.count("track") )
171  {
172  vector<unsigned int> tTracks = aOptions["track"].as< vector<unsigned int> >();
173  if ( std::find( tTracks.begin(), tTracks.end(), tTrackID ) == tTracks.end() )
174  continue;
175  }
176 
177  if( ! tTrackWorld.Valid() )
178  continue;
179 
180  if ( aOptions.count("terminator") )
181  {
182  string tTerminator = READ_STRING( tTrackWorld, "terminator_name", "" );
183  if ( tTerminator != aOptions["terminator"].as< string >() )
184  continue;
185  }
186 
187  if ( aOptions.count("generator") )
188  {
189  string tGenerator = READ_STRING( tTrackWorld, "creator_name", "" );
190  if ( tGenerator != aOptions["generator"].as< string >() )
191  continue;
192  }
193 
194  std::cout << "Analyzing track #" << tTrackID << " of event #" << tEventID << std::endl;
195 
196  PREP_GRAPH( ZPosition, tColor );
197  PREP_GRAPH( Radius, tColor );
198  PREP_GRAPH( Steps, tColor );
199  PREP_GRAPH( ElectricPotential, tColor );
200  PREP_GRAPH( ElectricField, tColor );
201  PREP_GRAPH( MagneticField, tColor );
202  PREP_GRAPH( Time, tColor );
203  PREP_GRAPH( Speed, tColor );
204  PREP_GRAPH( Acceleration, tColor );
205  PREP_GRAPH( KineticEnergy, tColor );
206  PREP_GRAPH( PolarAngle, tColor );
207  PREP_GRAPH( AziAngle, tColor );
208  PREP_GRAPH( LongKineticEnergy, tColor );
209  PREP_GRAPH( PolarAngleChange, tColor );
210  PREP_GRAPH( StepLength, tColor );
211  PREP_GRAPH( MagneticMomentChange, tColor );
212  PREP_GRAPH( TotalEnergyChange, tColor );
213  PREP_GRAPH( CumulTotalEnergyChange, tColor );
214 
215  if (tStepReader.HasObject( "output_step_world" ))
216  {
217  KSReadObjectROOT& tStepWorld = tStepReader.GetObject( "output_step_world" );
218 
219  bool tIsFirstStep = true;
220  double tCumulTotalEnergyChange = 0.;
221  double tLastPathLength = 0.;
222  double tLastPolarAngle = 0.;
223  double tLastTime = 0.;
224  double tLastSpeed = 0.;
225  double tLastMagneticMoment = 0.;
226  double tLastTotalEnergy = 0.;
227  double tLastDirection = 0.;
228 
229  for( tStepReader = tTrackReader.GetFirstStepIndex(); tStepReader <= tTrackReader.GetLastStepIndex(); tStepReader++ )
230  {
231  unsigned int tStepID = tStepReader.GetStepIndex() - tTrackReader.GetFirstStepIndex();
232 
233  if( ! tStepWorld.Valid() )
234  continue;
235 
236  double tPositionZ = READ_VECTOR_Z( tStepWorld, "position", 0. );
237  double tPositionR = READ_VECTOR_R( tStepWorld, "position", 0. );
238  double tTime = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "total_time", 0. );
239  tTime = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "time", tTime ); // fallback
240  double tPathLength = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "total_length", 0. );
241  tPathLength = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "length", tPathLength ); // fallback
242  double tSpeed = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "speed", 0. );
243  //double tMomentumMag = READ_VECTOR_MAG( tStepWorld, "momentum", 0. );
244  double tEFieldMag = READ_VECTOR_MAG( tStepWorld, "electric_field", 0. );
245  double tBFieldMag = READ_VECTOR_MAG( tStepWorld, "magnetic_field", 0. );
246  double tEPotential = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "electric_potential", 0. );
247  double tKinEnergy = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "kinetic_energy", 0. );
248  double tPolarAngle = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "polar_angle_to_b", 0. );
249  double tAziAngle = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "azimuthal_angle_to_x", 0. );
250  double tMagneticMoment = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "orbital_magnetic_moment", 0. );
251  double tTotalEnergy = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "total_energy",
252  tKinEnergy - tEPotential );
253  double tLongKinEnergy = READ_DOUBLE( tStepWorld, "longitudinal_kinetic_energy",
254  tKinEnergy * cos(tPolarAngle*KConst::Pi()/180.) * cos(tPolarAngle*KConst::Pi()/180.) );
255  double tDirection = READ_VECTOR_DOTP( tStepWorld, "magnetic_field", "momentum", 0.) ;
256 
257  if ( tPolarAngle > 90. )
258  tPolarAngle = 180. - tPolarAngle;
259 
260  if (! tIsFirstStep)
261  {
262  if (aOptions.count("nomirror") && (tDirection * tLastDirection < 0.))
263  continue;
264  }
265 
266  UPDATE_GRAPH( ZPosition, tPathLength, tPositionZ );
267  UPDATE_GRAPH( Radius, tPathLength, tPositionR );
268  UPDATE_GRAPH( Steps, tPathLength, tStepID );
269  UPDATE_GRAPH( ElectricField, tPathLength, tEFieldMag );
270  UPDATE_GRAPH( MagneticField, tPathLength, tBFieldMag );
271  UPDATE_GRAPH( ElectricPotential, tPathLength, tEPotential );
272  UPDATE_GRAPH( Time, tPathLength, tTime );
273  UPDATE_GRAPH( Speed, tPathLength, tSpeed );
274  //UPDATE_GRAPH( Acceleration, tPathLength, tAcceleration; );
275  UPDATE_GRAPH( KineticEnergy, tPathLength, tKinEnergy );
276  UPDATE_GRAPH( PolarAngle, tPathLength, tPolarAngle );
277  UPDATE_GRAPH( AziAngle, tPathLength, tAziAngle );
278  UPDATE_GRAPH( LongKineticEnergy, tPathLength, tLongKinEnergy );
279  //UPDATE_GRAPH( PolarAngleChange, tPathLength, tPolarAngleChange );
280  //UPDATE_GRAPH( StepLength, tPathLength, tStepLength );
281  //UPDATE_GRAPH( MagneticMomentChange, tPathLength, tMagneticMomentChange );
282  //UPDATE_GRAPH( TotalEnergyChange, tPathLength, tTotalEnergyChange );
283  //UPDATE_GRAPH( CumulTotalEnergyChange, tPathLength, tCumulTotalEnergyChange );
284 
285  if ( ! tIsFirstStep )
286  {
287  double tAcceleration = (tSpeed - tLastSpeed) / (tTime - tLastTime);
288  double tStepLength = tPathLength - tLastPathLength;
289  double tPolarAngleChange = fmod( tPolarAngle - tLastPolarAngle, 180. );
290  double tMagneticMomentChange = 2. * (tMagneticMoment - tLastMagneticMoment) / (tMagneticMoment + tLastMagneticMoment);
291  double tTotalEnergyChange = 2. * (tTotalEnergy - tLastTotalEnergy) / (tTotalEnergy + tLastTotalEnergy);
292 
293  tCumulTotalEnergyChange += fabs( tTotalEnergy - tLastTotalEnergy );
294 
295  UPDATE_GRAPH( Acceleration, tPathLength, tAcceleration );
296  UPDATE_GRAPH( PolarAngleChange, tPathLength, tPolarAngleChange );
297  UPDATE_GRAPH( StepLength, tPathLength, tStepLength );
298  UPDATE_GRAPH( MagneticMomentChange, tPathLength, tMagneticMomentChange );
299  UPDATE_GRAPH( TotalEnergyChange, tPathLength, tTotalEnergyChange );
300  UPDATE_GRAPH( CumulTotalEnergyChange, tPathLength, tCumulTotalEnergyChange );
301  }
302 
303  tIsFirstStep = false;
304  tLastPathLength = tPathLength;
305  tLastPolarAngle = tPolarAngle;
306  tLastTime = tTime;
307  tLastSpeed = tSpeed;
308  tLastTotalEnergy = tTotalEnergy;
309  tLastMagneticMoment = tMagneticMoment;
310  tLastDirection = tDirection;
311  }
312 
313  PRINT_GRAPH( ZPosition );
314  //PRINT_GRAPH( LongKineticEnergy );
315  //PRINT_GRAPH( StepLength );
316  //PRINT_GRAPH( TotalEnergyChange );
317  //PRINT_GRAPH( MagneticMomentChange );
318  }
319  }
320  }
321  }
322 
323  tReader.CloseFile();
324  tIndex++;
325 
326  return 0;
327 }
328 
329 int main(int argc, char **argv)
330 {
331  //katrin::KMessageTable::GetInstance().SetTerminalVerbosity( eDebug );
332  //katrin::KMessageTable::GetInstance().SetLogVerbosity( eDebug );
333 
334  po::positional_options_description popt;
335  popt.add( "file", -1 );
336 
337  po::options_description opt("Allowed options");
338  opt.add_options()
339  ( "help,h", "produce help message" )
340  ( "run,R", po::value< vector<unsigned int> >(), "set run # to process" )
341  ( "event,E", po::value< vector<unsigned int> >(), "set event # to process" )
342  ( "track,T", po::value< vector<unsigned int> >(), "set track # to process" )
343  ( "terminator,t", po::value< string >(), "select tracks by terminator" )
344  ( "generator,g", po::value< string >(), "select tracks by generator" )
345  ( "nomirror,M", "do not show reflected electrons" )
346  ( "file,f", po::value< vector<string> >(), "ROOT input file" )
347  ( "output,o", po::value< string >()->default_value( argv[0] ), "output filename (without extension)" )
348  ;
349 
350  po::variables_map vm;
351  po::store( po::command_line_parser( argc, argv ).options( opt ).positional( popt ).run(), vm );
352 
353  if ( vm.count( "help" ) > 0 || vm.count( "file" ) < 1 )
354  {
355  cout << "Usage: " << argv[0] << " [options] <filename> [filename [...]]" << endl;
356  cout << opt << endl;
357  return 1;
358  }
359 
360  TObjArray *tOutputArray = new TObjArray();
361 
362  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( ZPosition, "Axial Position" );
363  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( Radius, "Radial Position" );
364  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( Steps, "Total Steps" );
365  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( ElectricPotential, "Electric Potential" );
366  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( ElectricField, "Electric Field" );
367  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( MagneticField, "Magnetic Field" );
368  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( Time, "Time of Flight" );
369  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( Speed, "Particle Speed" );
370  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( Acceleration, "Particle Acceleration" );
371  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( KineticEnergy, "Kinetic Energy" );
372  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( PolarAngle, "Pitch Angle" );
373  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( AziAngle, "Azimuthal Angle" );
374  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( LongKineticEnergy, "Long. Kinetic Energy" );
375  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( PolarAngleChange, "Pitch Angle Change" );
376  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( StepLength, "Step Length" );
377  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( MagneticMomentChange, "Magnetic Moment Change" );
378  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( TotalEnergyChange, "Total Energy Change" );
379  PREP_MULTIGRAPH( CumulTotalEnergyChange, "Cumul. Total Energy Change" );
380 
381  KRootFile* tRootFile;
382  vector< string > tInputFiles = vm["file"].as< vector< string > >();
383  for( vector< string >::iterator it = tInputFiles.begin(); it != tInputFiles.end(); ++it )
384  {
385  string tFilename = (*it);
386  mainmsg(eNormal) << "Reading from ROOT file <" << tFilename << "> ..." << eom;
387  tRootFile = KRootFile::CreateOutputRootFile( tFilename );
388  AnalyzeFile( tRootFile, vm );
389  delete tRootFile;
390  }
391 
392  TCanvas *tCanvas = new TCanvas( "canvas", "", 1500, 3000 );
393  tCanvas->Divide( 3, 6 );
394 
395  tCanvas->cd( 1 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( ZPosition, "AL", "s [m]", "z [m]" );
396  tCanvas->cd( 2 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( Radius, "AL", "s [m]", "r [m]" );
397  tCanvas->cd( 3 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( Steps, "AL", "s [m]", "n [1]" );
398 
399  tCanvas->cd( 4 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( ElectricPotential, "AL", "s [m]", "U [V]" );
400  tCanvas->cd( 5 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( ElectricField, "AL", "s [m]", "|E| [V/m]" );
401  tCanvas->cd( 6 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( MagneticField, "AL", "s [m]", "|B| [T]" );
402 
403  tCanvas->cd( 7 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( Time, "AL", "s [m]", "t [s]" );
404  tCanvas->cd( 8 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( Speed, "AL", "s [m]", "v [m/s]" );
405  tCanvas->cd( 9 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( Acceleration, "AL", "s [m]", "a [m/s^2]" );
406 
407  tCanvas->cd( 10 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( KineticEnergy, "AL", "s [m]", "E_{kin} [eV]" );
408  tCanvas->cd( 11 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( PolarAngle, "AL", "s [m]", "#theta [deg]" );
409  tCanvas->cd( 12 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( AziAngle, "AL", "s [m]", "#phi [deg]" );
410 
411  tCanvas->cd( 13 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( LongKineticEnergy, "AL", "s [m]", "E_{long} [eV]" );
412  tCanvas->cd( 14 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( PolarAngleChange, "AL", "s [m]", "#Delta #theta [deg]" );
413  tCanvas->cd( 15 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( StepLength, "AL", "s [m]", "#Delta s [m]" );
414 
415  tCanvas->cd( 16 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( MagneticMomentChange, "AL", "s [m]", "#delta #mu [1]" );
416  tCanvas->cd( 17 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( TotalEnergyChange, "AL", "s [m]", "#delta E [1]" );
417  tCanvas->cd( 18 ); DRAW_MULTIGRAPH( CumulTotalEnergyChange,"AL", "s [m]", "#Sigma(#Delta E) [eV]" );
418 
419  tCanvas->Modified();
420  tCanvas->Update();
421 
422  string tOutputFile = vm["output"].as< string >();
423 
424  tCanvas->SaveAs( (tOutputFile + string(".png")).c_str() );
425  //tCanvas->SaveAs( (tOutputFile + string(".pdf")).c_str() );
426  delete tCanvas;
427 
428  TFile *tFile = new TFile( (tOutputFile + string(".root")).c_str(), "RECREATE" );
429  tOutputArray->Write();
430  tFile->Close();
431  delete tFile;
432 
433  return 0;
434 }
